summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons press release announcing the death of inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019. He was found unresponsive, transported to a hospital, and pronounced dead.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The inmate found unresponsive and later pronounced dead at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. He was under pretrial status after being indicted for sex trafficking offenses.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York at approximately 6:30 p.m. Life-saving measures were initiated, he was transported to a hospital, and was subsequently pronounced dead.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019, at approximately 6:30 p.m.
He was transported to a local hospital where he was pronounced dead.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation was notified of his death.
Epstein was a 66-year-old male inmate under pretrial status after being indicted for sex trafficking offenses.
The Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York is an Administrative security facility housing 763 male offenders at the time.
